Use 'U' to reveal all keyframes on a selected layer.
Alt+Click (Option+Click) on a stopwatch to add an expression.
Press '0' on the numpad for RAM Preview.
Caps Lock prevents the Composition panel from refreshing, speeding up renders.
Double-tap 'L' to reveal audio levels only.
Double-tap 'M' to reveal all mask properties.
Ctrl+Shift+D (Cmd+Shift+D) splits a layer at the current time indicator.
Use the 'Graph Editor' to smooth out your animations.
Right-click on a keyframe > Keyframe Assistant > Easy Ease (F9) for smoother motion.
